en.welcome: Welcome to Rock, Paper, Scissors, Lizard, Spock!
en.selectionInstructions:
Please make a selection. Type a number:
1) Rock 2) Paper 3) Scissors 4) Lizard 5) Spock
en.selectionError:
That's not a valid selection.
Please type either 1, 2, 3, 4 or 5.
en.goodbye: Thank you for playing. Live long, and prosper!
